attributes.action: We demand Council Elections in May 2025 take place as democratically scheduled.
attributes.additional_details: While the 2024 GENERAL ELECTION currently may not yet be rerun, even with the blatently broken promises, other SCHEDULED Elections MUST take place as further application of the Democratic process we are proudly supposedly to be living under without fear or favour. Please 'Let Right be done' and the People's voices heard as should be the normal case - Thank You.
attributes.background: We do not accept that ANY Government has the lawful power to cancel ANY scheduled Democratic Elections. We find it outrageous this can be attempted for obviously political reasons. I wish for our parliament to serve US the people, as should be their role and hold our democratic Elections as usual.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
